question: The "Doumeira Islands" are located in which water body?
explanation: Doumeira Islands are disputed islands presently under the administration of Djibouti, claimed by Eritrea located in the Red Sea near Bab-el-Mandeb. It is located to the northeast of Djibouti and to the east of Eritrea. In 1996, both Eritrea and Djibouti almost went to war after a Djibouti official accused Eritrea of shelling Doumeira Islands.
